query:
INSERT INTO posts (account_id, content, hashtags, status, scheduled_for, created_at) 
VALUES (
  1, 
  'Testing PowerPlant Energy Instagram automation! üå±‚úàÔ∏è\n\nSustainable Aviation Fuel (SAF) is revolutionizing air travel by reducing carbon emissions by up to 80% compared to traditional jet fuel. PowerPlant Energy is at the forefront of this transformation, developing innovative bamboo-based SAF solutions.\n\nJoin us in building a cleaner future for aviation. What role do you think SAF will play in achieving net-zero emissions?',
  '["#SustainableAviationFuel", "#SAF", "#CleanAviation", "#bioenergy", "#renewableenergy", "#climateaction", "#PowerPlantEnergy", "#GreenTech", "#NetZero", "#SustainableFuture"]',
  'scheduled',
  NOW(),
  NOW()
);
